title: Ep. #42 | Love Songs // Theme of the Week
description:
It’s the week of Valentine’s Day~ Eddie joins the show again to spill some more tea on the Nam bros and to review some classic K-pop love songs with Eric. Listen to them review classics like ‘Love Song’ by Eric, ‘Joah’ by Jay Park, and ‘Baby Baby’ by 4MEN. Also, stick till the end for Eddie's lovely shoutout to his Valentines.

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios

#EricNam #DaebakShow #LoveSong #Joah #JayPark #BabyBaby #4MEN #ValentinesDay #Kpop #DIVEStudios
